oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Construction at the Davidson County Courthouse, Nashville, Tennessee, between 1976 and 1977
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photographs of construction to the south and east areas at the Davidson County Courthouse and Public Building, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1976 and 1977. Prior to this time, the Courthouse was surrounded by solid blocks of nineteenth century commercial and warehouse buildings. These were demolished, for the construction of vast parking lots. Forms part of the Metro Archives Photographs - Buildings Collection. 37 b & w photographs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Davidson County Court House (Nashville, Tenn.)--History--Sources
